definition: an experienced person/sb who has "been around (the block)"/sb who has personally experienced it
(experienced action marker)
surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

sentences.english: You're both experienced persons and know well the depth of the water.
sentences.chinese: 你們都是過來人，知道水有多深。

sentences.english: He said that wouldnt be enough. I end up counselling people about it because Ive been through it.
sentences.chinese: 由於我是過來人，所以不願對此事說長道短。

sentences.english: Industry executive, coach, friend, could be family member to be your mentor.
sentences.chinese: 行業主管，過來人，朋友，也可以找家人做你的導師。

sentences.english: I survived them so why shouldn't she listen to me and take in the knowledge that I had from the experiences of my past.
sentences.chinese: 我是過來人，爲什麼她就是聽不進我的前車之鑑呢？

definition: to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
to bring to a conclusion/to settle (a dispute)/to do away with (oneself)/to break off (a relationship)/resolution (of a problem)
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
to learn through experience/experience/practiced/experienced
to deceive/to cheat
to talk sb round/to straighten sth out/to enlighten
to suffer losses/to come to grief/to lose out/to get the worst of it/to be at a disadvantage/unfortunately
swindler/a cheat
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted
to press charges/to file a complaint
to tell/to inform/to let know
